data.name: BrVR Backrooms Virtual Reality Demo
data.detailed_description:
No-Clip Out Of Reality and Into BrVR

Explore~Scavenge~Survive

BrVR Backrooms Virtual Reality features:

- Explore 60+ immersive levels
- Enjoy 40+ interactable items to use while exploring or in combat
- Slay entities to progress forward and don't let them catch you!
- Craft items, shelters, and weapons to help you survive with scavenged materials
- Trade with NPCs to gain valuable items
- Upgrade benches allow you to make better items
- There are three difficulty modes
- Liquid brewers allow you to create new substances and items such as fortified almond water
- Befriend entities and let them fight for you
- There is a sandbox mode where you can spawn items at will, meet the entities, and tinker with backrooms objects
- There's a No gore/no entities mode where you can freely survive among the backrooms
- Cut down trees (we don't promote deforestation) to make shacks
- A front rooms area where you can pick out your loadout and then no-clip into the backrooms
- A vault in your front rooms to store items you've found, achievements you've completed, and special secrets you've collected
- "Dark" levels, a serious challenge with 4 times the entities, more darkness, murky water, and heightened danger

BrVR (Backrooms Virtual Reality) is a survival horror game based on The Backrooms, a popular internet creepypasta. The Backrooms first appeared on 4Chan. The Backrooms are out of the boundaries of the real world and can only be accessed by no-clipping through a floor, elevator, wall, etc., in a place that inspires deja vu or an uncomfortable feeling of nostalgia. Explore the liminal spaces, survive the entities, scavenge for food, supplies, and weapons, craft items to trade, and help you survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon Vega 56 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 3500 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: There are weapons that can be used to kill entities. Blood particles are present and ambient blood decals can be seen in houses on level 9 or just scattered around in generally shady environments.
